Title: Permits concealed carry at state rest and parking areas and scenic overlooks
Summary: Provides that the department of transportation shall not prohibit concealed carry firearms at state rest and parking areas and scenic overlooks by persons with a valid permit to carry concealed.
LawCode: Amd ยง1626, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to permitting concealed carry at state rest and parking areas and scenic overlooks
